import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve BTC staking transactions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/btc/transactions/active"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Returns the list of valid/active staking trasactions of a given bitcoin address or public key hash.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"btcAddress","in":"query","required":true,"description":"The BTC address to retrieve staking transactions for.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"pkHash","in":"query","required":true,"description":"Public key hash associated with the given BTC address.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Active BTC staking transactions retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Code indicating the success of the operation."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Additional information or message about the response."},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"stakedBTCTxList":{"type":"array","description":"List of active BTC staking transactions.","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"candidateAddress":{"type":"string","description":"The address of the candidate for the staking transaction."},"btcAddress":{"type":"string","description":"The BTC address associated with the staking transaction."},"btcTXId":{"type":"string","description":"The transaction ID of the BTC staking."},"confirmedTxHash":{"type":"string","description":"The hash of the confirmed BTC transaction."},"btcAmount":{"type":"string","description":"The amount of BTC staked."},"script":{"type":"string","description":"The script associated with the staking transaction."},"startRound":{"type":"integer","description":"The round when the staking transaction started."},"endRound":{"type":"integer","description":"The round when the staking transaction ends."},"delegateRound":{"type":"integer","description":"The round when the staking was delegated."},"outputIndex":{"type":"integer","description":"The index of the output in the BTC transaction."},"rewardAddress":{"type":"string","description":"The address to receive rewards from the staking transaction."},"unlockTime":{"type":"integer","description":"The unlock time for the BTC staking transaction."},"redeemAddress":{"type":"string","description":"The address to redeem BTC from the staking transaction."},"pkHash":{"type":"string","description":"Public key hash associated with the BTC address."},"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Integer indicating the status of the stake."}}}},"stakedBTCAmount":{"type":"integer","description":"Total amount of BTC currently staked."}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid BTC address or public key hash supplied.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string","description":"Error code for the operation."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message explaining the issue."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
